import React,{useEffect}from'react';import bgStart from'../../assets/img/general/bg-start.png';import'../ResultGameModal/ResultGameModal.css';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{resetGame}from'../../store/gameSlice';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ResultGameModal=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const showResultGameModal=useSelector(state=>state.game.showResultGameModal);const finalScore=useSelector(state=>state.game.finalScore);// Result Game
useEffect(()=>{if(showResultGameModal){document.querySelector('.modal-result-game').style.display='flex';document.querySelector('.final-score-text').innerText=finalScore;document.querySelector('.restart-game-text').addEventListener('click',()=>{document.querySelector('.modal-result-game').style.display='none';dispatch(resetGame());});document.querySelector('.result-game-button-close').addEventListener('click',()=>{document.querySelector('.modal-result-game').style.display='none';});}},[showResultGameModal,finalScore,dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"modal-result-game",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result-game-wrapper",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"result-game-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:bgStart,alt:"Game result"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"result-game-button-close"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{id:"your-own-score",children:"Your Own Score"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"final-score-text",children:"0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"choices-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primary-button cancel-game-text",children:"Cancel game"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"primary-button restart-game-text",children:"Restart game"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"register-toggle-label",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Register"})})]})});};export default ResultGameModal;
